thread.title: NFC West Watch: Rams hope to hand Cardinals first loss
thread.title_full: NFC West Watch: Rams hope to hand Cardinals first loss

author: Jayson Jenks
title: NFC West Watch: Rams hope to hand Cardinals first loss
text:
This week: At Arizona, 1:25 p.m. 
Last week: Lost to Pittsburgh, 12-6. 
Notable: You could draw a pretty good metaphor out of what happened before the game in St. Louis last week: While the pregame pyrotechnics went off, the field turf caught on fire, forcing the game to be delayed. The Rams’ season has gone much the same way: A brilliant display of power and electricity in a season-opening win against the Seahawks followed by two turf-up-in-flames losses. San Francisco 49ers 
This week: Green Bay, 1:25 p.m. 
Last week: Lost at Arizona, 47-7. 
Notable: First-year coach Jim Tomsula already is having to answer questions about the future of quarterback Colin Kaepernick. Namely, does Kaepernick have one with the 49ers? Kaepernick passed for 67 yards and threw four interceptions in a blowout loss against the Cardinals. One Bay Area columnist wrote after the loss in Arizona, “Yeah, that 49ers performance set the franchise back a good 10 years” and called the loss “rock bottom.” Jayson Jenks
